# <a name="how-to-remove-autogenerated-columns-from-a-windows-forms-datagridview-control"></a><span data-ttu-id="a86b0-102">如何：移除 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中自動產生的資料行</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a86b0-102">How to: Remove Autogenerated Columns from a Windows Forms DataGridView Control</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a86b0-103">當您的 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> 控制項設定為根據資料來源中的資料來自動產生其資料行時，您可以選擇性地省略特定資料行。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a86b0-103">When your <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control is set to autogenerate its columns based on data from its data source, you can selectively omit certain columns.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a86b0-104">若要這麼做，您可以在 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A> 集合上呼叫 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.Remove%2A> 方法。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a86b0-104">You can do this by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.Remove%2A> method on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A> collection.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a86b0-105">或者，您可以將 [<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible%2A>] 屬性設定為 [`false`]，以隱藏資料行。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a86b0-105">Alternatively, you can hide columns from view by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible%2A> property to `false`.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a86b0-106">當您想要在某些情況下顯示隱藏的資料行，或當您需要存取資料行中的資料而不顯示它時，這項技術會很有用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a86b0-106">This technique is useful when you want to display the hidden columns in certain conditions, or when you need to access the data in the columns without displaying it.</span></span>  
  
### <a name="to-remove-autogenerated-columns"></a><span data-ttu-id="a86b0-107">若要移除自動產生的資料行</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a86b0-107">To remove autogenerated columns</span></span>  
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a86b0-108">在 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A> 集合上呼叫 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.Remove%2A> 方法。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a86b0-108">Call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.Remove%2A> method on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A> collection.</span></span>  
  
     [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#111](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/CS/datagridviewmisc.cs#111)]
     [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#111](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/VB/datagridviewmisc.vb#111)]  
  
### <a name="to-hide-autogenerated-columns"></a><span data-ttu-id="a86b0-109">隱藏自動產生的資料行</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a86b0-109">To hide autogenerated columns</span></span>  
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a86b0-110">將資料行的 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible%2A> 屬性設定為 [`false`]。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a86b0-110">Set the column's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible%2A> property to `false`.</span></span>  
  
     [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#112](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/CS/datagridviewmisc.cs#112)]
     [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#112](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/VB/datagridviewmisc.vb#112)]

## <a name="compiling-the-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="a86b0-112">編譯程式碼</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a86b0-112">Compiling the Code</span></span>  
 <span data-ttu-id="a86b0-113">這個範例需要：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a86b0-113">This example requires:</span></span>  
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a86b0-114">名為 `dataGridView1` 的 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> 控制項，系結至包含 `Fax` 和 `CustomerID` 資料行的資料表，例如 Northwind 範例資料庫中的 `Customers` 資料表。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a86b0-114">A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control named `dataGridView1` bound to a table that contains `Fax` and `CustomerID` columns, such as the `Customers` table in the Northwind sample database.</span></span>  
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a86b0-115"><xref:System?displayProperty=nameWithType> 和 <xref:System.Windows.Forms?displayProperty=nameWithType> 組件的參考。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a86b0-115">References to the <xref:System?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms?displayProperty=nameWithType> assemblies.</span></span>
